definitions.definition: a sweet, sticky yellow-brown substance made by bees that is spread on bread, etc. like jam

examples.text: a jar of locally produced honey
to gather honey from the hive

definitions.definition: a way of addressing somebody that you like or love

examples.text: Have you seen my keys, honey?

definitions.definition: a person that you like or love and think is very kind

examples.text: He can be a real honey when he wants to be.

definitions.definition: a place where life is pleasant and easy and people are very happy

examples.text: He dreamed of emigrating to Canada—the land of milk and honey.

wordOrigin: Old English hunig, of Germanic origin; related to Dutch honig and German Honig.
